45 namespace Teuchos {
46 
47 double Utils::chopVal_ = 1.0e-16;
48 
49 double Utils::chop(const double& x)
50 {
51  if (std::fabs(x) < chopVal_) return 0;
52  return x;
53 }
54 
55 std::string Utils::trimWhiteSpace( const std::string& str )
56 {
57  typedef std::string::size_type size_type;
58  const size_type len = str.length();
59  if (len==0) {
60  return str;
61  }
62  size_type first_non_white = 0;
63  for(
64  first_non_white = 0 ;
65  isWhiteSpace(str[first_non_white]) && first_non_white < len ;
66  ++first_non_white
67  );
68  // Above, if only whitespace is found, then first_non_white==len on
69  // termination of the loop!
70  size_type last_non_white = 0;
71  for(
72  last_non_white = len-1 ;
73  isWhiteSpace(str[last_non_white]) && (last_non_white != 0);
74  --last_non_white
75  );
76  // Above, if only whitespace is found, last_non_white==0 on termination of
77  // the loop!
78  if( first_non_white > last_non_white )
79  return std::string(""); // The std::string is all whitespace!
80  return str.substr(first_non_white,last_non_white-first_non_white+1);
81 }
82 
83 std::string Utils::toString(const int& x)
84 {
85  char s[100];
86  std::sprintf(s, "%d", x);
87  return std::string(s);
88 }

90 std::string Utils::toString(const unsigned int& x)
91 {
92  char s[100];
93  std::sprintf(s, "%d", x);
94  return std::string(s);
95 }
96 
97 std::string Utils::toString(const double& x)
98 {
99  char s[100];
100  std::sprintf(s, "%g", x);
101  return std::string(s);
102 }
103 
104 std::string Utils::getParallelExtension(
105  int procRank_in
106  ,int numProcs_in
107  )
108 {
109 
110  int procRank = -1;
111  int numProcs = -1;
112  if( numProcs_in > 0 ) {
113  procRank = procRank_in;
114  numProcs = numProcs_in;
115  }
116  else {
117  procRank = Teuchos::GlobalMPISession::getRank();
118  numProcs = Teuchos::GlobalMPISession::getNProc();
119  }
120 
121  int maxProcOrder = 1;
122  double tmp = numProcs;
123  for( int i = 0; i < 10; ++i, tmp *= 0.1 ) {
124  if(tmp >= 1.0)
125  ++maxProcOrder;
126  else
127  break;
128  }
129 
130  std::ostringstream parallelExtension;
131  parallelExtension
132  << std::setfill('0')
133  << std::right << std::setw(maxProcOrder)
134  << numProcs
135  << "."
136  << std::setfill('0')
137  << std::right << std::setw(maxProcOrder)
138  << procRank;
139  return parallelExtension.str();
140 }
141 
142 } // end namespace Teuchos

Teuchos
The Teuchos namespace contains all of the classes, structs and enums used by Teuchos, as well as a number of utility routines.
